asteroids

Class Ship

  • java.lang.Object
    • asteroids.Ship
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IShip

    public class Ship
extends java.lang.Object
implements IShip
    A class of ships involving its position, velocity, acceleration, direction, speed limit and shape.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tom Sydney Kerckhove & Xavier Go√°s Aguililla
    Invariants:
  • The direction of this ship is a valid direction.
        canHaveAsDirection(getDirection())
  • The position of this ship is a valid position.
        canHaveAsPosition(getPosition())
  • The shape of this ship is a valid shape.
        canHaveAsShape(getShape())
  • The speedLimit of this ship is a valid speed limit.
        canHaveAsSpeedLimit(getSpeedLimit())
  • The velocity of this ship is a valid velocity.
        canHaveAsVelocity(getVelocity())

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ship()
      Initializes this new ship with default values.

      Initializes this new ship with a given direction, position, shape, speedLimit and velocity.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ship

        public Ship(Direction direction,
    Position position,
    CircleShape shape,
    double speedLimit,
    Velocity velocity)
     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
            java.lang.NullPointerException
        Initializes this new ship with a given direction, position, shape, speedLimit and velocity.
        Parameters:
        direction - The given direction.
        position - The given position.
        shape - The given shape.
        speedLimit - The given speed limit.
        velocity - The given velocity
        Effects:
      • The direction of this ship is set to the given direction.
            setDirection(direction)
      • The position of this ship is set to the given position.
            setPosition(position)
      • The shape of this ship is set to the given shape.
            setShape(shape)
      • The speed limit of this ship is set to the given speed limit.
            setSpeedLimit(speedLimit)
      • The velocity of this ship is set to the given velocity.
            setVelocity(velocity)
        • Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - [CAN]
            The given shape is not a legal shape.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - [CAN]
            Any of the parameters is null.

      • Ship

        public Ship()
        Initializes this new ship with default values.
        Effect:
        Initializes this new ship with the extended ship constructor and default values.
            this(new Direction(),new Position(),new CircleShape(Ship.getMinimumRadius()),Velocity.getSpeedOfLight(),new Velocity())

@Raw
protected boolean canHaveAsPosition(Position position)
        Checks whether this ship can have the given position as its position.

        position - The position to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given position is not null.

        @Basic
@Raw
public void setPosition(Position position)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                        java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Sets the position of this ship to the given position.
        Parameters:
        position - The new position for this ship.
        Postcondition:
        The position of this ship is now equal to the given position.
            new.getPosition() == position
        Throws:

            !canHaveAsPosition(position)

      • getVelocity

        @Basic
@Raw
public Velocity getVelocity()
        Gets a velocity equal to the velocity of this ship.

      • canHaveAsVelocity

        @Basic
@Raw
protected boolean canHaveAsVelocity(Velocity velocity)
        Checks whether this ship can have the given velocity as its velocity.
        Parameters:
        velocity - The velocity to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given velocity is not null and its magnitude is at most the speed limit.
            result = ((velocity != null) && (velocity.getVelocity() <= getSpeedLimit()))

      • setVelocity

        @Basic
@Raw
public void setVelocity(Velocity velocity)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Sets the velocity of this ship to the given velocity.
        Parameters:
        velocity - The new velocity for this ship.
        Postcondition:
        If this ship can have the given velocity as its velocity, then the velocity of this ship is now equal to the given velocity.
            if canHaveAsVelocity(velocity)
             then new.getVelocity() == velocity
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - [CAN]
            isTerminated()

      • getSpeedLimit

        @Basic
@Raw
public double getSpeedLimit()
        Returns the speed limit of this ship.

      • canHaveAsSpeedLimit

        @Basic
@Raw
protected boolean canHaveAsSpeedLimit(double speedLimit)
        Checks whether this ship can have the given speed limit as its speed limit.
        Parameters:
        speedLimit - The speed limit to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given speed limit is positive and at most the speed of light.
            result = ((speedLimit >= 0) && (speedLimit <= Velocity.getSpeedOfLight()))

      • setSpeedLimit

        @Basic
@Raw
public void setSpeedLimit(double speedLimit)
                   throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
        Sets the speed limit of this ship to the given speed limit.
        Parameters:
        speedLimit - The new speed limit for this ship.
        Postcondition:
        If this ship can have the given speed limit as its speed limit, then the speed limit of this ship is now equal to the given speed limit.
            if canHaveAsSpeedLimit(speedLimit)
             then new.getSpeedLimit() == speedLimit
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - [CAN]
            isTerminated()

      • canHaveAsShape

        @Basic
@Raw
protected boolean canHaveAsShape(@Raw
                               CircleShape shape)
        Checks whether this ship can have the given shape as its shape.
        Parameters:
        shape - The shape to check.
        Returns:
        True if and only if the given shape is not null and has a range of at least the minimum radius for ships.
            result = ((shape != null) && (shape.getRadius() >= Ship.getMinimumRadius()))

        Changes the position of this ship based on the current position, velocity and a given duration of the movement.

        Effect:
        Sets the position of this ship the position after moving.
            getPosittion().moveBy(getVelocity(), duration)
        Throws:

            ((Double.isNaN(getPosition.getXComponent()) || Double.isNaN(getPosition.getYComponent()))
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - [CAN] The given duration is strictly negative.
            duration <= 0
